author: Archilochus
text: We don't rise to the level of our expectations, we fall to the level of our training.
original: πόλλ’ οἶδ’ ἀλώπηξ, ἀλλ’ ἐχῖνος ἓν μέγα

author: Archilochus
text: The fox knows many things, but the hedgehog knows one big thing.
original: πόλλ’ οἶδ’ ἀλώπηξ, ἀλλ’ ἐχῖνος ἓν μέγα

author: Socrates
text: One thing I know: that I know nothing.

author: Anonymous
text: A goal without a plan is just a wish.

author: Sun Tzu
text: Just as water retains no constant shape, so in warfare there are no constant conditions.
